name: Zenergo
tag_list: consumer-web, social-networking, groups, events, friend-search, real-world, social-life-organization
overview:
Zenergo is a new social site designed to Activate Your Life with easy, yet powerful tools allowing you to discover, connect and share with people and groups around your favorite activities and interests.

Zenergo combines the functionality of email, photo sharing, event creation, group management, location and criteria-based search and calendaring in a single, safe, free and easy-to-use system, eliminating the need for many other website services.

Most social networks take a â€œsingle bucketâ€ approach, meaning all contacts are considered to be in the same social circle, with the same social status to the primary networker. Other social networking sites only provide a single aspect of networking such as single group management or single event management. Zenergoâ€™s unique design and individual features provides a whole solution, thatâ€™s completely integrated

The core technology, in development for over 2 years, is based on detailed, individual activity profiling, creating social resumes that map to real life and providing a more meaningful social networking experience. Zenergo also offers a location-based and criteria matching service so users can expand their social network with new like-minded people.

Because Zenergo is activity-based, users will self-select themselves into their favorite interests (over 300 consumer verticals) initially allowing us to laser target marketing programs on a contextually relevant basis for national brands, local merchants and service providers.

Zenergoâ€™s target demographic is the underserved post-college and above market, which is the fastest growing social networking audience both in the U.S. and globally.
